attributes.action: NOT grant a peerage to Michael Martin the ex-speaker of the house of commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This individual is just the type that gets rewarded by the Labour Party for faliure. Mr Martin should stay just that MR, no Sir and certainly no Lord.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
